CSSPerspective.summary: The CSSPerspective interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents the {{cssxref("transform-function/perspective", "perspective()")}} value of the individual {{CSSXRef('transform')}} property in CSS. It inherits properties and methods from its parent .

CSSPerspectiveCSSPerspective.summary:
The CSSPerspective() constructor creates
a new object representing the {{cssxref("transform-function/perspective", "perspective()")}} value of
the individual 'transform' property in CSS.

CSSPerspectiveLength.summary:
The length property of the
interface sets the distance from z=0.

remarks.para:
It is used to apply a perspective transform to the element and its content. If the
value is 0 or a negative number, no perspective transform is applied.
